# [Interview #587: TOM Signing Report - Sarayne, Entry #44](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=587#44)

#### Question

When will you come out with the next Stormlight book?

#### Brandon Sanderson

A year after
*A Memory of Light*
.
